item.title: ~~~~~ custom ring help 317~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

so basically the goal is to make a ring for donators only that give 5 PVP points per kill instead of 1 point when killed not wearing the ring…this is the code i wrote and it compiles fine just doesnt do anything?

if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM(“Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {
if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){
killerz.pkpoints += 5;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, with a donator ring, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
} else {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
}
}
}

EDIT: i really need help with this guys cmon…someone has to be able to help…

Read full topic
